lines.text: You're gonna try to fly this thing back?
Joe, did you ever skip a flat rock across a lake and watch it skim and bounce along the surface? I wanna give reentry that kind of shot.
I have skipped a few rocks on a few lakes in my time and I never saw yet one that didn't sink. It's one chance in a million.
I am scared out of my mind being up here inside this plane and you want me to go outside?
I'll need a wire stripper and some wire nuts... and a dry pair of pants when I get back.
